title: Best Generals Zero Hour Torrent
description:
This is best Generals Zero Hour torrent in the world. It contains everything you need in order to download and play Zero Hour without any problems.

How to install.

Step 1.
Install Daemon Tools which you can get here.
http://www.filehippo.com/download_daemon_tools

Step 2.
Mount Disks and install the game same way you would do from actual disks. When it asks for key use the keygen to generate one.

Step 3.
Install patches.

Step 4.
Install gentool which you can get here.
http://gentool.net/

Step 5.
In "My Documents" folder create new folder and name it
Command and Conquer Generals Zero Hour Data
then copy options.ini file there.

Step 6.
Follow instructions found here.
http://www.gamereplays.org/community/index.php?showtopic=951075

In order to play online follow instructions found here.
http://www.gamereplays.org/community/index.php?showtopic=951054

Good luck general
